trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取的访问密钥<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>调用

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 访问密钥<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取的控件类型<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>调用

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的子元素的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>调用

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的名称<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>调用

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含"MenuItem"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的文本标签<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>调用

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性可以看作是用户将用于说明所引用的控件的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 务必要具有中的所有控件的文本表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]以便你可以以编程方式引用到控件本地化的方式。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含标签的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的控件模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下情况之一，此方法将返回当前<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: -`patternInterface`等于<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>与此关联<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>具有子<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: -`patternInterface`等于<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>与此关联<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>没有子<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: -`patternInterface`等于<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>与此关联<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>其可选的属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果`patternInterface`等于<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>，此方法返回实现的对象<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果支持控件模式的对象 patternInterface 是支持的值; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
